content.question: Political diversity in Iranâ€™s Majles is most constrained by which of the following?

choices.label: The vetting of candidates by the Guardian Council
The unwillingness of Iranians to support candidates who would challenge the government
The use of a single-member district (SMD) electoral system in Iran
The dominance of a single party in the Majiles

content.answer: The vetting of candidates by the Guardian Council

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
